mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WK(EMP_NUM, SITE_NUM, WK_START_DT) VALUES(#{empNum},#{siteNum},#{wkStartDt})
mapper.select: SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY EMP_NUM DESC) RNUM , EMP_NUM,EMP_NM,ZIP_CODE,ADDR1,ADDR2,PHN_NUM,POS,DEPT_NM FROM EMP ) T WHERE T.RNUM BETWEEN #{currentPage} * 3 - 2 AND #{currentPage} * 3

SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SITE_NUM DESC) RNUM,SITE_NUM,SITE_NM, ADDR,PHN_NUM,CONT_AMT,IN_PEO,ST_DT,EX_COM_DT,ETC FROM SITE ) T WHERE T.RNUM BETWEEN #{currentSitePage} * 3 - 2 AND #{currentSitePage} * 3
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM WK WHERE EMP_NUM = #{empNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM WK WHERE SITE_NUM = #{siteNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM EMP
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM SITE
